import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Tent, Mountain, Flower, Bird, Sun, MapPin, Phone } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from '../components/ui/button'; import { Card, CardContent } from '../components/ui/card'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: , title: "Off-Grid Camping", description: "Authentic tent and caravan sites with no electricity - pure tranquility under starry skies" }, { icon: , title: "Rugged Landscapes", description: "Stunning Namaqualand scenery with mountains, plains, and dramatic sunsets" }, { icon: , title: "Flower Season", description: "Witness the famous wildflower bloom (August-September) - one of nature's greatest shows" }, { icon: , title: "Wildlife Spotting", description: "See Springbok, Klipspringer, diverse birds, and reptiles in their natural habitat" } ]; const facilities = [ "Clean bathroom facilities", "Solar-heated showers", "Communal kitchen", "Dedicated braai room", "Spacious camping pitches", "Low-impact environment" ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

De Riet Off-Grid Campsite

Authentic Off-Grid Camping in Namaqualand, Northern Cape

Discover true off-grid camping in the heart of Namaqualand, South Africa. Located just 10km from Koingnaas on the wild west coast, unplug from the city and reconnect with nature at our rustic campsite.

GPS: 30°09'19"S, 17°21'20"E
{/* Decorative wave */}
{/* Features Grid */}

Experience Namaqualand's Natural Beauty

Surrounded by breathtaking landscapes, mountains, vast plains, and dramatic sunsets

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

 ))}
{/* About Section */}

Pure Off-Grid Tranquility

No grid electricity means pure peace – only the sounds of wind, wildlife, and waves from the nearby Atlantic. Our off-grid setup includes essential comforts for an unforgettable experience.

Perfect for weekend getaways, long retreats, digital detoxes, or flower-season adventures. Whether you're seeking caravan camping near Koingnaas or tent camping in Northern Cape's outback, De Riet delivers raw, authentic off-grid living.

Our Facilities

    {facilities.map((facility, index) => (
  • {facility}
    • ))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready for Your Namaqualand Adventure?

Contact Pieter & Allische today to book your stay at De Riet Off-Grid Campsite. Experience the magic of Namaqualand's wilderness.

); }; export default Home;
